Package BobcatLib.Hardware.Motors

Class MotorConfigs

java.lang.Object
BobcatLib.Hardware.Motors.MotorConfigs
public class MotorConfigs extends Object
A configuration class for motor settings. This class holds the various parameters and settings that define the motor configuration, including control gains, sensor direction, motor state, and other optional configurations.

    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    CANDeviceDetails
    canDevice
    The CAN device details, including device number and bus.

    The integral gain (kI) for motor control.
    double

    The proportional gain (kP) for motor control.
    NeutralModeWrapper.disabledMode
    mode
    The neutral mode of the motor, determining the behavior when the motor is disabled.
    double
    motorToGearRatio
    The gear ratio between the motor and the connected gear.
    OptionalConfigCtre
    optionalCtre
    Optional configuration for the CTRE motor controller.
    OptionalConfigRev
    optionalRev
    Optional configuration for the REV motor controller.
    SensorDirectionWrapper
    sensorDirection
    The direction of the motor sensor (inverted or not).
